name: Jam Folder Protector
body:
JAM Overview ==================== JAM Folder Protector is a software designed to provide personal folder security at the reach of simple computer users. Installation ------------ Download the installation file for JAM from here. Then, just go through the installation procedures. System Requirements ------------ Your computer must have the following specifications to install and to use JAM:
CPU 1 GHz (minimum)
RAM 512 MB (minimum)
Operating System Windows Vista SP2, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, and Windows 10
.NET Framework 4.5 and above
Tested Platform ------------ JAM Folder Protector was developed and tested in a computer system with the following specifications:
CPU Intel Core i5-3317U 1.70 GHz
RAM 8 GB
Operating System Windows 10
.NET Framework 4.6
Usage ------------ You can read its manual here.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
